sentences.english: And we had the cheek to call the Taliban vandals.
sentences.chinese: 而我们还曾厚颜无耻地称塔利班为野蛮人。

sentences.english: He CNNs his old friends for not lending money to him.
sentences.chinese: 老朋友们因为不愿意借钱给他而遭到他无耻地辱骂。

sentences.english: Heard this words, connect I scold the oneself shameless, what way of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 听了这段话，连我都骂自己无耻，什么思路。

sentences.english: It is the most impudent piece of pretension I ever heard of in my life.
sentences.chinese: 这是我一生中从没听说过的最厚颜无耻的一项要求了。

sentences.english: I was, though, completely unaware of the outrageous way the media portrays the Gypsy population.
sentences.chinese: 然而我完全不知道媒体对吉普赛人的无耻可恶的描绘。

sentences.english: To tell a barefaced lie to your friends will create bad relationships.
sentences.chinese: 告诉朋友厚颜无耻的谎言，将会造成不良的关系。

sentences.english: And the site's cheeky bravado rubs salt in the wounds.
sentences.chinese: 并且网站厚颜无耻并自信满满地往它们的伤口上撒盐。

sentences.english: This motherfucker man, won't shut up will you?
sentences.chinese: 你这个无耻混蛋，还不肯闭上嘴是吗？

sentences.english: Her mother had said cruel, shameless things.
sentences.chinese: 她妈妈说了些残忍而无耻的话。

sentences.english: It's barefaced robbery asking such a high price for that old bicycle!
sentences.chinese: 那辆旧自行车要价如此之高真是无耻的敲诈。

sentences.english: Exporting TV dramas is just one way for Koreans to shamelessly promote themselves.
sentences.chinese: 出口韩剧也是韩国人无耻自我吹嘘的一个途径。

sentences.english: It is a shameless piece of plagiarism .
sentences.chinese: 这是一个无耻的剽窃行为。

sentences.english: And did you not remonstrate against such infamy?
sentences.chinese: 您没办法阻止这种无耻的行为吗？

sentences.english: The shameless loafer has no facial of hypocritical male.
sentences.chinese: 无耻无赖无脸的伪善男。

sentences.english: Chinese mind since then are stuffed with barbarian spirit of vulgarity and shamelessness .
sentences.chinese: 中国人的样子从当时候起就充溢了蛮横，俗气和无耻。

definition: to have no sense of shame/shameless
to have no sense of shame
